title: Parameter
description: Schema for a parameter object. Parameters represent typed inputs to actions, queries, and events. A parameter must have a name and may optionally include data type rules describing the expected value type. If validation fails, verify 'name' is present and non-empty.

name.description: The name of the parameter (e.g., 'amount', 'user_id', 'email_address'). This is the identifier used to reference the parameter in specifications and implementations. Must be non-empty. If validation fails: ensure this is a string with at least one character.

data_type_rules.description: Optional data type rules describing the expected value type and constraints for the parameter (e.g., 'positive integer', 'non-empty string', 'valid email address'). Helps implementers understand the expected input format.
